member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponseSendingExtensions
member.summary: Convenience methods for writing to the response.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponseSendingExtensions.SendAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponse,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a response with the given Content-Type and body. UTF-8 encoding will be used, and the Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponseSendingExtensions.SendAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponse,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a response with the given Content-Type, encoding, and body. The Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponseSendingExtensions.SendAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponse,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a response with the given body. UTF-8 encoding will be used, and the Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponseSendingExtensions.SendAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.Http.HttpResponse,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a response with the given encoding and body. The Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.summary: Sends a response with the given Content-Type and body. The Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.summary: Sends a response with the given Content-Type and body. The Content-Length header will be set accordingly.

member.summary: Sends a response with the given body. The Content-Length header will be set accordingly.
